smul_mem':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `tensor_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem smul_mem' (p : Submodule (tensor_product A R B) M) (b : B) {m : M} (hm : m ∈ p) : «expr • » b m ∈ p :=
  by
  suffices «expr • » b m = «expr • » («expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » (1 : A) R b) m by exact this.symm ▸ p.smul_mem _ hm
  simp [tensor_product.algebra.smul_def]
#align smul_mem' smul_mem'
smul_mem:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `tensor_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/-

Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Oliver Nash
-/
theorem smul_mem (p : Submodule (tensor_product A R B) M) (a : A) {m : M} (hm : m ∈ p) : «expr • » a m ∈ p :=
  by
  suffices «expr • » a m = «expr • » («expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » a R (1 : B)) m by exact this.symm ▸ p.smul_mem _ hm
  simp [tensor_product.algebra.smul_def]
#align smul_mem smul_mem
